text: Population Research and Policy Review is a bimonthly peer-reviewed academic journal covering demography. It was established in 1982 and is published by Springer Science+Business Media on behalf of the Southern Demographic Association, of which it is the official journal. The editors-in-chief are Kara Joyner and Corey Sparks (both at The University of Texas at San Antonio). According to the Journal Citation Reports, the journal has a 2019 impact factor of 1.215. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Demography journals Category:Springer Science+Business Media academic journals Category:Publications established in 1982 Category:Bimonthly journals Category:English-language journals
title: Population Research and Policy Review
